item.title: Andrea add a quote by Muriel Barbery
item.description: "We never look beyond our assumptions and what's worse, we have given up trying to meet others; we just meet ourselves." -- Muriel Barbery

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Donâ€™t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form." -- Rumi

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Colette
item.description: "It's so curious: one can resist tears and 'behave' very well in the hardest hours of grief. But then someone makes you a friendly sign behind a window, or one notices that a flower that was in bud only yesterday has suddenly blossomed, or a letter slips from a drawer... and everything collapses. " -- Colette

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Nobody can hurt me without my permission." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Justice will not be served until those who are unaffected are as outraged as those who are." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Mervyn Peake
item.description: "And now, my poor old woman, why are you crying so bitterly? It is autumn. The leaves are falling from the trees like burning tears- the wind howls. Why must you mimic them?" -- Mervyn Peake

item.title: Andrea add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "O may I join the choir invisible Of those immortal dead who live again In minds made better by their presence; live In pulses stirred to generosity, In deeds of daring rectitude..." -- George Eliot

item.title: Andrea add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Pain insists upon being attended to. God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our consciences, but shouts in our pains. It is his megaphone to rouse a deaf world." -- C.S. Lewis
